text: Elias Michael TheodorouMIXED MARTIAL ARTS SHOW RESULTS. STATE OF NEVADA, DEPARTMENT OF BUSINESS AND INDUSTRY ATHLETIC COMMISSION (December 10, 2015) (May 31, 1988 â€“ September 11, 2022) was a Canadian mixed martial artist. He competed for the UFC in the Middleweight division. He won The Ultimate Fighter Nations: Canada vs. Australia. He was born in Mississauga, Canada. He became the first professional athlete to be exempt for cannabis use in North America in January 2020. Theodorou died on September 11, 2022 from liver cancer at the age of 34. ==References== Category:1988 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Canadian mixed martial artists Category:Deaths from liver cancer Category:Sportspeople from Mississauga
title: Elias Theodorou
